des:
The Hi-Mit II Hisense Internet of Things platform connects all types of central air conditioners from Hisense, including VRF, Water Modules, Heat Pumps, and other equipment, providing users with remote intelligent control services. The new version already supports Alexa voice control, and you can use the Alexa speaker to transmit voice commands to the central air conditioning.
When you come in after work, you can call Alexa to help you turn on the air conditioning; When you are cooking for your family in the kitchen, you can ask Alexa to adjust the temperature of the children's room and study; When you rest in bed, you don't need to get up to adjust the air conditioning mode; When you are reading on the sofa, you can adjust the temperature of the hot water in the bathroom through voice... With unlimited control over the sound.
Before using, please download the latest version of the HiMi II app and bind it to your home air conditioning device. Activate the Alexa or HiMi II activation skill button to complete account binding.
During use, please customize a name for each air conditioning device in your room, which will be displayed in the Alexa application and will be part of the voice command. You can refer to the following voice style:
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom air conditioner”
“Alexa, set the Bedroom AC temperature to 26 degrees”
“Alexa, what is the temperature of the bedroom AC”
“Alexa, increase Bedroom AC temperature.”
“Alexa, increase Bedroom AC by 2 degrees”
“Alexa, set Bedroom AC to cool.”
